title.narrative: Melamchi Water Supply Project - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The MWSP is a comprehensive water supply project aiming to improve the health and well-being of the people in Kathmandu Valley. It will alleviate the shortage of potable water in the Kathmandu Valley by diverting water from the Melamchi River to the Kathmandu Valley. Melamchi tunnel is a key component of the MWSP, and its performance impacts the pace and progress of several downstream water supply and wastewater projects in the Kathmandu Valley.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Shortage of potable water in Kathmandu Valley alleviated.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2016: An additional 170 MLD of potable water piped to the inhabitants of Kathmandu Valley (2007 baseline: 100 MLD).

description.narrative: Shortage of potable water in Kathmandu Valley alleviated.
